<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/python/02_simple/source.py">
"""Represents a user account in the system."""
from datetime import datetime

class User:
    # A simple representation of a user with basic attributes.
    __init__(self, user_id: int, username: str, email: str)
    deactivate(self) -> None
    get_status(self) -> str
    __repr__(self) -> str
</file>
